mapper.select: select * from orderinfo where usernumber = #{usernumber} and linkid = #{linkid}
select c.* from orderinfo o, cp_game cg, cpinfo c where o.gameid = cg.gameid and cg.cpid = c.cpid and o.usernumber = #{usernumber} and o.linkid = #{linkid}
select c.* from orderinfo o, cp_game cg, cpinfo c where o.gameid = cg.gameid and cg.cpid = c.cpid and o.orderno = #{orderNo}

select c.cpname cpName, sum(o.price) price, date_format(o.modifytime, '%d') dayNo from orderinfo o, cpinfo c, cp_game cg where c.cpid = cg.cpid and cg.gameid = o.gameid and state = '1' and date_format(o.modifytime, '%Y%m') = date_format(now(), '%Y%m') - 1 group by c.cpname, date_format(o.modifytime, '%Y%m%d');

select g.gamename gameName, sum(o.price) price, date_format(o.modifytime, '%d') dayNo from orderinfo o, gameinfo g, cp_game cg where o.gameid = g.gameid and g.gameid = cg.gameid and cg.cpid = #{cpId} and o.state = '1' and o.reply != '2' and date_format(o.modifytime, '%Y%m') = date_format(now(), '%Y%m') - 1 group by g.gamename, date_format(o.modifytime, '%Y%m%d');
mapper.insert: insert into orderinfo (orderno, prop, price, state, sms, reply, gameid, usernumber, linkid, modifytime) values (#{orderNo}, #{prop}, #{price}, #{state}, #{sms}, #{reply}, #{gameId}, #{usernumber}, #{linkid}, #{modifyTime})
mapper.update: update orderinfo set sms = 1 where orderno = #{orderNo}
mapper.delete:
delete from orderinfo where orderno in
#{orderNo}
